column2: Holding Amphipolis is vital to controlling the Aegean and the approach to Thrace. It is time we conquer it.
Our land has been conquered by foreigners. No other state will take us seriously while we remain impotent.
The Paeonians to the north have been harassing our borders for generations. It is time we put a stop to their incursions.
The city-states of Thessaly have asked us for our aid in the past. Their independence is once again under threat, so we must offer them our protection.
